website_summaries.verdict: A multi-purpose table with ample storage space and a worktop that is easy to adjust. If you need an affordable drafting table that's packed with features, this is the one to buy.
pros: Angle of the top is very easy to adjust
Lots of storage space for supplies, thanks to 3 side drawers and a roomy shelf that's conveniently situated under the tabletop
cons: Assembly is a bit time-consuming, especially when it comes to aligning the pieces of the stool
Some complaints of bent components/misaligned predrilled holes

customer_reviews.title: Great for homework desks
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were trying to figure out a better arrangement for our kids to do their homework. Our dining room table was getting way too cluttered. We saw these at a big box craft store for considerably more money. When we found them on Amazon, we went ahead and bought two. These are pretty easy to put together. All of the parts were labeled, and the directions were clear. Because they are art desks, the table top will lay flat or lift up to an angle. Each of the kids chose a slightly different angle. The canvas drawers are handy for keeping their supplies organized. Overall, we're very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mwthet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably easy for one person to assemble. Mine was missing one screw. My husband was able to find a replacement. The desk looks nice in our 12 year old daughter’s room. It would be small for an adult, unless they want a small desk for a small room. But plenty big for a 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Maxeroni

customer_reviews.title: Great product at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an artist and a crafty mom. I have to start by telling that it wasn't difficult to assemble it, just follow the steps and it was pretty fast as well. The table is perfect for a smaller space, it is very comfortable and I love the fact that it can be an art table and a sewing station (that's what i use the table for).
customer_reviews.author: Valeriya Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my stepsons birthday, we are so excited for him to see it. Great quality for the price. The drawers are basically fabric bins though, not sure how those are going to hold up and the stool is kinda meh - which I had planned on getting him another stool for it at some point anyways so not a huge deal. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tabletop came broken
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this desk. My roommate and I assembled all the metal parts together and the instructions were easy to follow. Took us about an hour. We got near the end and unboxed the tabletop for the last few steps and found that despite having packaging protectors, one corner was completely broken. The outer packaging doesn’t show any signs of damage. I’m also not able to get the screws tight into the stool - not sure why. The desk regardless looks really great and feels sturdy - but had to give a 3. I’ve contacted the seller and I’m hoping they’ll send me a replacement top soon! Excited to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Swetha

customer_reviews.title: Overall great with a few minor drawbacks to consider.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter desk. Had no issue with it both in building and using. The chair isn't amazing, but it works and doesn't break. I recommend getting a more comfortable chair if you plan on using this desk as often as I do. The drawers are not solid, they're fabric so be mindful of that, but again, it's a starter table and the framework itself is very sturdy. That's all you need.

customer_reviews.title: Old purchase from Michael's
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for years now, I bought it used from a Michael's so it wasn't a surprise that it was damaged, however, over time the drawers sag. Don't put books and collectively heavy items in the drawers. It's good for crafting, not drawing/paints/papers. I had to replace the stool because it was not comfortable. I suggest buying for yarn crafts or a material assembly station.
